titleStmt.title: The fal of the late Arrian
titleStmt.author: Proctor, John, 1521?-1584.

publicationStmt.publisher: in Fletestrete at the signe of the George, by Willia[m] Powell,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon. British Library and Bodleian Library copies misdated 1049--STC.
Contains the list of reasons for doubting the divinity of Christ with refutations, found among Marlowe's papers in Kyd's posessions--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Fletestrete at the signe of the George
